long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Protect Your Browsing with Free simple Adult Blocker!

Keep your web experience safer by filtering out inappropriate content. Free simple Adult Blocker automatically blocks explicit sites, ensuring a clean browsing environment.

Features:

Advanced Filtering: Blocks explicit content.
SafeSearch: Ensures search results remain family-friendly.
Community Reporting: Users can report inappropriate content to improve filters.
Real-Time Protection: Constantly monitors and blocks harmful content.
Password-Protected Settings: Secure your settings with a password to prevent changes.
